description: This file defines a React component for a login page, handling user input, authentication via API call, and navigation upon success.

methods.name: Login()
methods.description: React functional component rendering a login form, managing state for email, password, submitting status, and errors, and handling form submission.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Async function handling form submission, calling API login, storing token and user info in localStorage, and navigating on success.
